resources.name: Query: Get Organization As Owner of Organization
Query: Get Organization As Member Of Organization
Mutation: Add or Change Org Member

body.text:
{"query":"# The access key token must belong to a user with appropriate permissions. The user must either be the owner OR have a custom role with the administer (manage organization user) permission. 


# accountId is the org id.
#
# role can be either MEMBER or ADMIN
# roleId is the customRole ID

mutation {
	setMember(
		accountId: "XX:XX"
		email: ["email@example.com"]
		# Do not use role and roleId together.
		# role can be used when there are no custom roles. Values are MEMBER or ADMIN
		role: MEMBER
		# roleId is used when it is a custom role. See Query: Get Organization As Owner of Organization for fetching roles. Note if you are not the organization owner, you will need to combine it with Query: Organization General Query Example.
		roleId: 225
	)
}"}

Query: Get All Tags for Own Account

body.text:
{"query":"#List of tags owned by the user or Organization making query
query {
	login {
		tags {
			name
			color
			created
		}
	}
}

# 	List of available colors

{"query":"#Create a tag with color that can be assigned to devices and custom roles

mutation {
	setTag(tag: { name: "example", color: 2 })
}

resources.name: Mutation: Add Multiple Tags to Devices

body.text:
{"query":"#Proxy connections can be generated to individual services and the unique
#address will be provided in the host and port fields.
#
#hostIP values could contain
#
#0.0.0.0 for fully public connections available to user
#
#255.255.255.255 to allow only the first accessing IP to "Latch" the connection.
#Blocking all others
#
#A unique public IP address to only allow that IP to access the connection

mutation GetConnection($serviceId: String!, $hostIP: String!) {
	connect(serviceId: $serviceId, hostIP: $hostIP) {
		id
		created
		host
		port
		reverseProxy
		timeout
	}
}
","operationName":"GetConnection","variables":{"serviceId":"80:00:00:12:34:56:78:90","hostIP":"255.255.255.255"}}
